sentences.en: But to allow polygyny but not polyandry would be to discriminate against women.
sentences.cn: 但是如果允许一夫多妻制却禁止一妻多夫制,那么可能就会是对妇女的一种歧视.

sentences.en: McLennan knew only three forms of marriage: polygyny, polyandry and monogamy.
sentences.cn: 麦克伦南只知道三种婚姻形式: 一夫多妻制, 一妻多夫制和个体婚制.

sentences.en: Men live in polygyny, while women in polyandry.
sentences.cn: 男子过着多妻制的生活，而妇女则过着多夫制的生活。

sentences.en: Polyandry alone is lacking - it took human beings to achieve that.
sentences.cn: 所缺乏的只是多夫制,这一点只有人类才能做得出来.

sentences.en: They practice what is known as fraternal polyandry -- where the brothers of one family marry the same woman.
sentences.cn: 他们是事实上所谓的兄弟一妻多夫制（fraternal polyandry ）---一家的兄弟娶同一个老婆。

words.tran_cn: 多夫妇女；赞成一妻多夫制的妇女

trans.tran_cn: 一妻多夫（制），一妻多夫制，多雄性，一雌多雄
trans.tran_en: the practice or condition of being married to more than one husband at the same time
